patientBody:
## Discharge advice

You were treated today for renal colic (suspected kidney stone).

Hydration advice:
- Drink enough water to keep your urine pale.
- Avoid alcohol if you are taking strong pain medicines.

Pain control plan:
{{analgesia_plan}}

{{#if stone_size_mm}}Estimated stone size: {{stone_size_mm}} mm.{{/if}}

{{#if tamsulosin}}Take tamsulosin as prescribed. It can cause light-headedness, so stand up slowly.{{/if}}

{{#if urine_strainer}}Use the urine strainer and bring any stone fragments for analysis.{{/if}}

## Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Fever or rigors
- Uncontrolled pain or persistent vomiting
- Reduced urine output
- Worsening symptoms

## Follow-up
{{followup_plan}}
